languages.text: "Ваши искренние облегчение и радость — словно яркая картина в этом ужасном месте, отрада для моих очей. Я тоже... тоже счастлива видеть вас, Абеляр".
"Your sincere relief and joy are like a vivid painting in this dreadful place, a balm to my eyes. I... I am glad to see you too, Abelard."
languages.original_text: "Ваши искренние облегчение и радость — словно яркая картина в этом ужасном месте, отрада для моих очей. Я тоже... тоже счастлива видеть вас, Абеляр".

traits.locale_text: "Your sincere relief and joy are like a vivid painting in this dreadful place, a balm to my eyes. I... I am glad to see you too, Abelard."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your sincere relief and joy are like a vivid painting in this dreadful place, a balm to my eyes. I... I am glad to see you too, Abelard."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your sincere relief and joy are like a vivid painting in this dreadful place, a balm to my eyes. I... I am glad to see you too, Abelard."

traits.locale_text: "Your sincere relief and joy are like a vivid painting in this dreadful place, a balm to my eyes. I... I am glad to see you too, Abelard."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “在这个可怕的地方，你真诚的宽慰与喜悦就像一幅栩栩如生的画，令我的双眼感到慰藉。我……我也很高兴见到你，阿贝拉德。”
languages.original_text: "Your sincere relief and joy are like a vivid painting in this dreadful place, a balm to my eyes. I... I am glad to see you too, Abelard."

traits.locale_text: “在这个可怕的地方，你真诚的宽慰与喜悦就像一幅栩栩如生的画，令我的双眼感到慰藉。我……我也很高兴见到你，阿贝拉德。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « La sincérité de vos paroles exsude de couleurs vives qui viennent égayer ce lieu sinistre. C'est un véritable baume pour les yeux. Je... je suis moi aussi contente de vous voir, Abélard. »
languages.original_text: "Your sincere relief and joy are like a vivid painting in this dreadful place, a balm to my eyes. I... I am glad to see you too, Abelard."

traits.locale_text: « La sincérité de vos paroles exsude de couleurs vives qui viennent égayer ce lieu sinistre. C'est un véritable baume pour les yeux. Je... je suis moi aussi contente de vous voir, Abélard. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «El alivio y la alegría sinceros que siente son como un cuadro muy vivo en este espantoso lugar, un bálsamo para mis ojos. Yo... también me alegro de verle, Abelard».
languages.original_text: "Your sincere relief and joy are like a vivid painting in this dreadful place, a balm to my eyes. I... I am glad to see you too, Abelard."

traits.locale_text: «El alivio y la alegría sinceros que siente son como un cuadro muy vivo en este espantoso lugar, un bálsamo para mis ojos. Yo... también me alegro de verle, Abelard».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたの真心から生まれた安堵と喜びは、この恐ろしい場所においては鮮やかな絵画のようですね。私も…私も会えて嬉しく思います、アベラルド」
languages.original_text: "Your sincere relief and joy are like a vivid painting in this dreadful place, a balm to my eyes. I... I am glad to see you too, Abelard."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの真心から生まれた安堵と喜びは、この恐ろしい場所においては鮮やかな絵画のようですね。私も…私も会えて嬉しく思います、アベラルド」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Eure aufrichtige Erleichterung und Freude sind wie ein lebendiges Gemälde an diesem trostlosen Ort, wie Balsam für meine Augen. Ich ... Ich bin auch froh, Euch zu sehen, Abelard."
languages.original_text: "Your sincere relief and joy are like a vivid painting in this dreadful place, a balm to my eyes. I... I am glad to see you too, Abelard."

traits.locale_text: "Eure aufrichtige Erleichterung und Freude sind wie ein lebendiges Gemälde an diesem trostlosen Ort, wie Balsam für meine Augen. Ich ... Ich bin auch froh, Euch zu sehen, Abelard."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Your sincere relief and joy are like a vivid painting in this dreadful place, a balm to my eyes. I... I am glad to see you too, Abelard."

languages.text: "İçinin ferahlayışı ve neşen, dehşet dolu bir yerde gördüğüm canlı bir resim gibi gözlerimi kamaştırıyor. Ben de seni gördüğüme sevindim Abelard."
languages.original_text: "Your sincere relief and joy are like a vivid painting in this dreadful place, a balm to my eyes. I... I am glad to see you too, Abelard."

traits.locale_text: "İçinin ferahlayışı ve neşen, dehşet dolu bir yerde gördüğüm canlı bir resim gibi gözlerimi kamaştırıyor. Ben de seni gördüğüme sevindim Abelard."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
